body_html: Noooo! Never change the data of intermediate Variables, it's a bad idea. I don't think we support it right now, but it would be fairly simple to add it will only need a few changes in Module.__call__.
body_text: Noooo! Never change the data of intermediate Variables, it's a bad idea. I don't think we support it right now, but it would be fairly simple to add it will only need a few changes in Module.__call__.
body: Noooo! Never change the `data` of intermediate Variables, it's a bad idea. I don't think we support it right now, but it would be fairly simple to add it will only need a few changes in `Module.__call__`.
